events.message: The customer reported a car collision involving their vehicle and a second driver on the morning of April 30th.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after verification of initial details mentioning a vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in auto insurance claims was assigned promptly to assist the customer with their car accident case.
The insurer acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and assured the customer that the process will be expedited.
Customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and a copy of their driving license for processing.
The customer submitted all requested documents including images of the accident scene and the official police collision report.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle accident has commenced, focusing on fault determination and damage assessment.
The investigation was completed with the conclusion that the other party was at fault; damage estimates have been finalized.
A settlement proposal was sent to the customer covering the full repair costs along with a rental vehicle reimbursement.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the clear communication throughout the claim process.
The claim was officially approved as per the agreement and readiness to proceed with payment and repairs was confirmed.
Payment for the vehicle repairs and rental reimbursement was issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account.
The claim was closed successfully following confirmation of completed repairs and customer satisfaction with resolution.
